abstract: Two Times columnists — Floyd Norris and David Leonhardt — talk about the state of the economy and the job market.
snippet: Two Times columnists — Floyd Norris and David Leonhardt — talk about the state of the economy and the job market.
lead_paragraph: 4:41 p.m. | Updated In advance of Friday’s jobs report, two Times columnists — Floyd Norris and David Leonhardt — talk about the state of the economy and the job market. [Their conversation continued on Friday morning, after the report was released.]
